overview:
Chief Financial Officer

Ms. Le provides management oversight and directs all significant financial aspects of the company, including risk management and financial compliance operations. She has more than 25 years experience in management in the chemical, oil & gas, nuclear, and power industries. Miss Le successfully managed a $220 million power project ahead of schedule and on budget. Over the course of her career, she has held various management positions with a large utility (Florida Power and Light), as well as a large engineering, procurement, and construction firm (Fluor Corporation). She is a certified financial planner and holds a masterâ€™s degree in Business Administration from the University of California, Irvine.
